name: Aqua Voice
headline: Voice-only text editor
description: Aqua is a voice-driven text editor. It lets you speak naturally, like to a person, and writes down what you meant in the format you want.

founders.name: Jack McIntire, Founder
founders.description: CTO @ Aqua Voice / prev. Arcturus Intelligence / Harvard dropout

generated_description:
### Aqua Voice: The Voice-Only Writing Revolution

**Overview:**
Founded in 2023 and hailing from San Francisco, Aqua Voice is a fresh addition to the tech landscape, emerging from Y Combinator's W24 batch. This spirited startup has a compact team of three, fueled by a bold mission: to redefine the text-editing experience through voice. 

**What They Do:**
Aqua Voice operates as a voice-driven text editor that empowers users to speak as they would normally. You don’t have to labor over commands or keywords; just talk to Aqua, and it’ll translate your words into coherent text, precisely formatted to your specifications. Imagine telling it, "Write an email about next week's meeting," and it handles the rest.

**Core Features:**
- **High Accuracy:** The platform boasts a staggering 99.1% accuracy rate, outperforming other voice typing solutions like Siri or Google Voice—about 17 times fewer mistakes.
- **Effortless Formatting:** Aqua intuitively understands the context and format you need, whether crafting legal documents or casual emails.
- **Universal Compatibility:** The technology seamlessly integrates with your favorite apps—Slack, Notion, Discord, and more, enabling a smooth workflow no matter where you’re working.
  
**Use Cases:**
Aqua Voice is perfect for anyone who thinks out loud—whether you’re a busy professional crafting reports, a student taking notes, or someone simply looking to get thoughts down faster. 

**Pricing:**
Aqua Voice opens its doors with a free tier that offers 1,000 words and basic functionality. For the avid user, a $10/month Pro plan provides unlimited words and advanced features, complete with priority support.

**Getting Started:**
Keen to try it out? Aqua Voice is ready for you, no credit card required. Just visit [their website](https://withaqua.com) to download the application for Windows or Mac.

**Backing and Community:**
With Michael Seibel as their Group Partner, Aqua isn’t just another startup; it’s part of a network that supports innovative solutions in tech. The early feedback from users highlights how it’s changing workflows, allowing them to capture thoughts organically and efficiently.

In essence, Aqua Voice isn’t just making writing easier; it's crafting a new narrative around how we interact with technology, one conversation at a time.
